question: What is the most illegal thing you'd do for $250,000?
Name one song you'd delete from existence if you could?
Sex is great and all, but have you tried _____?
If you have sex with Donald Trump once, you'll receive 10 million dollars OR be able to end world hunger. Would you do it? Which one would you pick?
Happy Canada Day/Memorial Day to our maple syrup-loving members. What is your favorite breakfast food and would you add maple syrup to it?
Each day you need to drink a glass of your own urine. Each day you get $10,000 — how many days until you call it quits?
You have to walk through a minefield with a 50% chance you'll live, or choose to be paralyzed from the waist down for life. Which do you choose?
Happy 4th of July! Name a place that is on your bucket list and what is preventing you from going there?
Would you rather be broke and have no one to hate, or be rich and have no one to love?
Would you rather lose an eye or have stomach cramps every day for 3 hours straight?
Would you rather have to always wear shoes that are three sizes too big, or always wear shoes that are one size too small?
Delete one ice cream flavor from existence — which flavor shall never return?
How much would someone have to pay you to go bald for one year?
In order to save your pet’s life, you have to kill your best friend's pet. There's a 50% chance they never find out it was you. Do you do it?
